message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, let's close this deal now.
Come on, let's meet in the middle
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Alice, let's be reasonable. This is a fair split. Don't let greed get in the way of a good deal.
Greed? You're the one losing value every round, not me
Okay Alice, let's stop this. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome. Don't risk losing everything.
A 50/50 split was fair in round 1, but now your money is worth less. Adjust your expectations
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit with the inflation, but this is a compromise. Let's end this before we both lose out.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But I'm not the one losing value every round. Take this or risk getting nothing
